org.anchoranalysis.plugin.image.task.bean.format.convertstyle

Class IndependentChannels

  • Object
    • AnchorBean<ChannelConvertStyle>
      • ChannelConvertStyle
        • IndependentChannels

  • public class IndependentChannels
extends ChannelConvertStyle
    Converts each channel independently and creates a single-channeled stack from the conversion.

    An identical channel-name is used to identify it among the outputted stacks.

    Author:
    Owen Feehan
